name: waifu2x-image-saver
title: Waifu2x-Image-Saver
description: Upres your images with a right click away using Waifu2x
author: matthewn4444@gmail.com

preferences.name: noise-reduction-level
preferences.title: Waifu2x Noise Reduction (option on the website)
preferences.description: Reduces noise if image has any, otherwise could add some.

preferences.name: compress-on-save
preferences.title: Compress Image
preferences.description: Saves the image on final upscale as JPEG to reduce the image size, can impact quality depending on percentage chosen. Will not work if image is transparent.

preferences.name: upscale-once
preferences.title: Upscale Once
preferences.description: All images will only upscale once.

preferences.name: max-area-upscale-once
preferences.title: Upscale Area
preferences.description: Only upscale an image once if its area is lower than specified, otherwise it will recursively upscale till reaches max size. 0 and larger than max size (2560x2560) will be ignored. (921600 is like 1280 x 720)
